main event: On April 7, 1949, military pilots observed a red and gray tumbling object and multiple white parachute-like objects during a flight over Riverside, California.
interesting points: The red and gray object was initially thought to be a falling tank,It was observed tumbling in a forward direction for a few seconds,The pilots also witnessed four parachute-like objects without visible shroud lines or bodies,The white objects reflected a pure white color and vanished in an easterly direction,The sighting took place around 8000 feet altitude during military training flights.
sighted object: red and gray tumbling object and four white parachute-like objects
witness description: Military pilots, Lt. Edwin B. Roesser and Lt. Marvin W. Van Salter
